mapper.select: select board_name from TB_board where board_code = #{boardCode}
mapper.delete: delete from TB_prefer where member_id = #{memberId} and board_code = #{boardCode} and post_no = #{postNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from TB_prefer where board_code = #{boardCode} and post_no = #{postNo}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_reply_${boardCode} values(#{boardCode}, #{postNo}, seq_${boardCode}_reply.nextval, #{replyWriter}, #{replyContent}, default, default, default)
mapper.select: select count(*) from TB_recommen where member_id = #{memberId} and board_code = #{boardCode} and post_no = #{postNo} and reply_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.update: update TB_post_${boardCode} set recommen_count = recommen_count + 1 where post_no = #{postNo}
update TB_reply_${boardCode} set recommen_count = recommen_count + 1 where post_no = #{postNo} and reply_no = #{replyNo}
